languages.text: "Ваша новая спутница — представительница опасного рода ксеносов, известных своим двуличием и хитростью. Если вы верите ее притворному согласию и покладистости — напрасно".

traits.locale_text: "Ваша новая спутница — представительница опасного рода ксеносов, известных своим двуличием и хитростью. Если вы верите ее притворному согласию и покладистости — напрасно".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Your new companion is a member of a dangerous breed of xenos notorious for their duplicity and cunning. It would be a mistake to place any trust in her facade of compliance and amenability."
languages.original_text: "Ваша новая спутница — представительница опасного рода ксеносов, известных своим двуличием и хитростью. Если вы верите ее притворному согласию и покладистости — напрасно".

traits.locale_text: "Your new companion is a member of a dangerous breed of xenos notorious for their duplicity and cunning. It would be a mistake to place any trust in her facade of compliance and amenability."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your new companion is a member of a dangerous breed of xenos notorious for their duplicity and cunning. It would be a mistake to place any trust in her facade of compliance and amenability."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your new companion is a member of a dangerous breed of xenos notorious for their duplicity and cunning. It would be a mistake to place any trust in her facade of compliance and amenability."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your new companion is a member of a dangerous breed of xenos notorious for their duplicity and cunning. It would be a mistake to place any trust in her facade of compliance and amenability."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “你的新同伴是一位危险的异形，他们的阴险与狡诈众所周知。如果她顺从的态度让你误以为她会服从你，那你就大错特错了。”
languages.original_text: "Your new companion is a member of a dangerous breed of xenos notorious for their duplicity and cunning. It would be a mistake to place any trust in her facade of compliance and amenability."

traits.locale_text: “你的新同伴是一位危险的异形，他们的阴险与狡诈众所周知。如果她顺从的态度让你误以为她会服从你，那你就大错特错了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Su nueva acompañante es miembro de una raza de xenos peligrosa y conocida por su duplicidad y su astucia. Sería un error confiar en su apariencia de sometimiento y sociabilidad».
languages.original_text: "Your new companion is a member of a dangerous breed of xenos notorious for their duplicity and cunning. It would be a mistake to place any trust in her facade of compliance and amenability."

traits.locale_text: «Su nueva acompañante es miembro de una raza de xenos peligrosa y conocida por su duplicidad y su astucia. Sería un error confiar en su apariencia de sometimiento y sociabilidad».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたの新しい仲間は、二枚舌と狡猾さで悪名高い、危険な異種族の一種だ。彼女の従順さを信用するのは間違いだ」
languages.original_text: "Your new companion is a member of a dangerous breed of xenos notorious for their duplicity and cunning. It would be a mistake to place any trust in her facade of compliance and amenability."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの新しい仲間は、二枚舌と狡猾さで悪名高い、危険な異種族の一種だ。彼女の従順さを信用するのは間違いだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Votre nouvelle amie fait partie d'une espèce de xénos connue pour sa duplicité et sa ruse. Ce serait une grave erreur que de lui faire confiance. Croyez-moi, sa complaisance et sa servilité ne sont qu'une façade. »
languages.original_text: "Your new companion is a member of a dangerous breed of xenos notorious for their duplicity and cunning. It would be a mistake to place any trust in her facade of compliance and amenability."

traits.locale_text: « Votre nouvelle amie fait partie d'une espèce de xénos connue pour sa duplicité et sa ruse. Ce serait une grave erreur que de lui faire confiance. Croyez-moi, sa complaisance et sa servilité ne sont qu'une façade. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Euer neuer Gefährte gehört zu einer gefährlichen Art der Xenos, die allesamt für ihr falsches Spiel und ihre List berüchtigt sind. Es wäre ein Fehler, wenn Ihr auf ihre Fassade der Konformität und Gefügigkeit hereinfallt."
languages.original_text: "Your new companion is a member of a dangerous breed of xenos notorious for their duplicity and cunning. It would be a mistake to place any trust in her facade of compliance and amenability."

traits.locale_text: "Euer neuer Gefährte gehört zu einer gefährlichen Art der Xenos, die allesamt für ihr falsches Spiel und ihre List berüchtigt sind. Es wäre ein Fehler, wenn Ihr auf ihre Fassade der Konformität und Gefügigkeit hereinfallt."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Yeni yoldaşın; düzenbazlıkları ve kurnazlıklarıyla kötü şöhret kazanmış, tehlikeli bir zeno türüne mensup. İtaatkâr ve uysal görünüşüne aldanıp ona güvenmek hata olur."
languages.original_text: "Your new companion is a member of a dangerous breed of xenos notorious for their duplicity and cunning. It would be a mistake to place any trust in her facade of compliance and amenability."
